[HOSTINGandVPS.com](https://hostingandvps.com/)

Our features include:

RAID1, SSD Cached 7200 RPM disks.
DDR3 ECC RAM.
Premium HP / Dell Intel Hardware.
Dedicated gigabit uplinks.
IPV4 = Native IPV6
Unmetered 1Gbps dedicated ports for each UK OVZ Node.
Unmetered 1Gbps dedicated ports for each Czech OVZ Node.




Support

Customer service is our number one priority. We have a professional team of UK and Indonesian support staff ready to answer any questions or issues that may arise. Our support staff are located around the world to provide rapid and professional ticket and email replies, with no more waiting for ticket 'escalation'!
All our servers use the latest E5 and E3 CPU's for maximum performance and reliability.

We use Redstation email relay for UK VPS's, please open a ticket if you have any issues getting email to work.
